column2: As an SAP Consultant with expertise in all modules, your job description may encompass a wide range of responsibilities, as you would be expected to work on multiple SAP modules across various functional areas      Here are some common responsibilities that could be part of the job description:      Business Process Analysis: Analyze business processes and requirements of the organization to identify opportunities for SAP module implementation and optimization      SAP Implementation and Customization: Participate in full-cycle SAP implementation projects, including gathering business requirements, designing solutions, configuring SAP modules, and conducting testing      Module Integration: Ensure seamless integration between different SAP modules and with external systems to support end-to-end business processes      Module Configuration: Configure various SAP modules to align with business needs, including Financial Accounting (FI), Controlling (CO), Materials Management (MM), Sales and Distribution (SD), Human Capital Management (HCM), Production Planning (PP), and more      User Training and Support: Provide training and support to end users on SAP functionality and processes      Address user queries, troubleshoot issues, and facilitate problem resolution      Data Migration: Plan and execute data migration activities during SAP implementations or system upgrades      System Upgrades and Enhancements: Participate in SAP system upgrades, applying patches, and implementing system enhancements to improve functionality and performance      Change Management: Manage change requests and document configuration changes to ensure a smooth and auditable change process      Testing and Quality Assurance: Conduct testing of SAP modules, including unit testing, integration testing, and user acceptance testing (UAT)      Documentation: Create and maintain documentation for SAP configurations, processes, and user manuals      Continuous Improvement: Stay updated with the latest SAP releases, features, and best practices      Identify opportunities for process improvements and propose innovative solutions to optimize SAP usage      Project Management: Work as part of a project team, collaborating with functional and technical consultants, project managers, and business stakeholders to deliver successful SAP projects
column11: Change management, Data migration, Manager Quality Assurance, SAP implementation, Production planning, Project management, Integration testing, Unit testing, Continuous improvement, User acceptance testing

column2: Our Professional Services team is looking for a high-performing Implementation Manager to provide consistent, high-quality, and innovative solution leadership to our team. The Implementation Manager will analyze business needs to help ensure Naehas solution meets the customer s objectives by combining industry best practices and product knowledge.          They will exercise judgment and business acumen in selecting methods and techniques to deliver functional and technical solutions on non-routine and very complex aspects of technology onboarding while providing direction, mentoring to project teams, and effectively influencing customer leadership o      n key decisions. Supports the business development efforts by pursuing new opportunities and resolves complex customer issues by recommending and implementing solutions. Demonstrates expertise in multiple business processes and the ability to implement technology solutions encompassing multiple products. These implementations will deliver the promised value to our customers and an amazing user experience.          THE OPPORTUNITY          Reporting to the Director of Professional Services, this is an incredible opportunity to work with Naehas largest and most strategic customers at respected and well-known brands. Internally, this is also an opportunity to contribute to the maturity of the Naehas Professional Services team and the development of Naehas products through customer feedback.          THE TEAM          You will be part of a team that acts as advocates for our customers by understanding their business challenges and collaborating with empathy to deliver a high-quality customer experience. The Professional Services team provides an instrumental layer of success for enterprise customers through custom solutions, technical expertise, and enterprise solution delivery.                THE SKILL SET            4 to 6 years experience leading SaaS/software implementation project delivery for large complex enterprise customers including 1 to 3 years of project management experience.          2 years of professional experience in technology services or consulting or in a field relevant to our customers.          2 years of external relationship management demonstrated the ability to build excellent relationships.          Services and/or Solutions delivery experience relative to Naehas core competencies preferred.          Highly intelligent, detail-oriented, and intellectually curious by nature.          Formal Project Management methodology training, with significant practical use. Certifications such as the Project Management Professional (PMP) are a plus.          Outstanding client-facing skills with a history of building extraordinary relationships with clients and colleagues.          Ability to handle a variety of different projects simultaneously; adapts quickly and easily manages multiple deadlines and multiple competing priorities in a fast-paced, rapidly changing environment.          Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, including experience, successfully delivering presentations, and managing meetings          Exceptional escalation management skills.          Ability to demonstrate thoughtfulness and excellent judgment when selecting methods and techniques for achieving project success.          Independently organizes and performs work required with minimal guidance, direction, and follow-up.          Ability to forecast work accurately, proactively manage workload, and assist project teams with doing the same.          Excellent teamwork skills. Works effectively as part of multiple, varied project teams and demonstrates a genuine commitment to team success.          Takes initiative and ownership. Proactive, results-oriented, with a can-do attitude in meeting critical deadlines.          A strong background in project management, including experience developing work-breakdown structures and project plans.          Ability to work creatively and analytically in a problem-solving environment.          Ability to proactively identify business opportunities related to customer engagements.          Willingness to travel. Our typical projects can require up to 20% travel.              WITHIN 1 MONTH YOU LL            You will get trained through a combination of online training and shadow sessions on our products and solutions.          You ll learn about Naehas implementation process--the sales lifecycle, packaging and pricing, value drivers, contracts, statements of work, implementation methodology, launch process, and the product roadmap.          Shadow implementation calls and training sessions across enterprise customers to build an understanding of implementation approach, methodology, key milestones, systems, processes, and the different customer needs by company size.          Meet with the Product Management team to understand current competencies and solutions, backlog, and solution delivery process.          Meet with relevant teams within the organization and more broadly across the company. You ll be working cross-functionally and building relationships early will set you up for success!          Factor these learnings and observations into your 30-60-90-day plan which you will present to your hiring manager. This will set you up for success to continue to get to know your org, the business, and build bridges across the company.                  WITHIN 3 MONTHS YOU LL            Take on your first customer in a project manager capacity to begin learning about Naehas implementation process.          Dive into understanding customer needs from a project management perspective during implementation and begin to put our best practices into action.          Become an expert in Professional Services (PS) processes, tools, frameworks, and templates that are used throughout the PS lifecycle.          Identify new and/or iterate on existing processes and templates as needed, thinking about efficiency and scalability.                  WITHIN 6 MONTHS YOU LL            Lead and own the strategic customer account, delivering end-to-end implementation from discovery, design, configuration, UAT, training through launch and post-launch services.          Serve as the Naehas product SME across all work with the customer, maintaining relationships and keeping stakeholders happy.          Collaborate with other members of the Naehas Professional Services team to continuously uplevel each other s skills, experience, and expertise.                  WITHIN 12 MONTHS YOU LL            Become a Naehas product SME and customer advocate as you guide customers from discovery through the launch of our products.          Build advanced knowledge of our platform and begin to participate in providing points of view on future functionality.          Work with leadership to cascade relevant PS processes, tools, frameworks, and templates.          Support initiatives that help improve PS operations (ie. increasing team efficiency, best practicing documentation, budgeting, etc.)
column11: Relationship management, Product management, Telecom, PMP, Consulting, Packaging, Budgeting, Project delivery, Customer engagement, Software implementation

column2: We are seeking candidates for Associate positions on the GLG Client Solutions team in Gurugram      The team is responsible for managing and executing primary research deliverables to add value to GLG clients, globally      These primary research deliverables include phone consultations and one-on-one meetings, as well as surveys, reports, and site tours with leading experts and C-suite executives      Associates are front-line client service professionals and work closely with our clients -- professionals at the world s top management consulting firms, investment firms, corporations, and non-profits on the critical decisions they make every day      Client Solutions Associates work in teams across industries, connecting our clients to the insight they need from leading doctors, academics, scientists, policy specialists, strategists, executives and other experts with years of on-the-ground experience      The role entails partnering closely with Client Solutions team members from APAC and providing support on APAC-based client projects afterhours                  Specific responsibilities include (but are not limited to):            Facilitating educational interactions    between GLG experts (Network Members) and our clients, enable our clients to make more informed and confident investment decisions. The Associate is tasked with fulfilling time sensitive research requests by analyzing client requests, building and qualifying primary populations of topic experts, and working with internal partners to develop customized interactions for clients. Most GLG client/expert interactions consist of telephone consultations, but also may consist of in-depth engagements, in-person interaction, survey and tour, etc.        Project support and management    of custom solutions for clients, which includes, but not limited to project scoping, project set up, client and expert engagement, vetting and highlighting experts, project follow up, recruitment of new experts, and compliance.        Enhancing GLG s expert network base    : Develop and manage relationships with GLG s most respected experts who are thought leaders across sectors, as well as recruit new senior executives and leading consultants into the GLG network through research, networking, and direct outreach.        Team-wide collaboration:    Work closely with our Asia-Pacific based Client Solutions team, as well as other functional professionals globally to develop customized products and solutions for GLG clients.        Compliance:    Navigate complex compliance requirements and operational procedures that differs across a wide pool of clients in daily project management, to protect the integrity of client engagements          An ideal candidate will have the following:          3-4 years of experience, ideally in consulting, financial services, market research, recruiting, other professional services or start-up environment      Prior experience in B2B client management / servicing, especially international based clients      Postgraduate / Graduate degree from a top-tier university      Superior communication and interaction skills, including demonstrated oral, written and presentation abilities in a business-focused setting using a variety of communication channels (telephone, e-mail, in-person, etc)      General understanding, awareness and interest in consulting and financial markets      Demonstrated entrepreneurial/leadership skills.      Experience interacting with senior executives      Ability to work effectively independently and/or collaboratively in a team      Ability to multi-task and prioritize effectively, while ensuring a high level of accuracy and attention to detail      Successful track record of working in a dynamic environment, often accompanied by stringent deadlines
column11: Networking, Primary research, Project management, Consulting, Management consulting, Market research, Operations, Financial services, Client management, Recruitment

column2: NetSuite AdministratorPune - India About the Optimas:  Optimas is a global distributor of integrated supply chain solutions, and engineering support focused on delivering fasteners, components, industrial and safety supplies to our diverse customers around the world. Our local, on-the-ground teams understand the nuances of every community we serve. This allows us to adapt with our customers and partners as needs evolve, leveraging our footprint to remain at your side while providing a highly personalized level of service and support no matter where you find yourself around the globe.To learn more, please visit our website  http://www.optimas.comPosition overview: We are currently seeking a seasoned NetSuite Administrator to join our dynamic team. This role is integral to configuring, customizing, and maintaining our NetSuite modules to bolster our operations. Main responsibilities:   Administer and customize NetSuite modules to support operations effectively. Develop, implement, and manage workflows, scripts, and customizations to streamline processes and enhance system functionality. Maintain robust user role management, permissions, and access controls to ensure data security and integrity. Drive pre-upgrade procedures such as discovery, release planning, reporting, and UAT. Manage day-to-day NetSuite operations, including user support, troubleshooting, and resolving issues. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand requirements, design solutions, and implement changes aligned with business objectives. Conduct thorough system audits to address data inconsistencies, errors, and inefficiencies. Enhance system performance and reliability through continuous monitoring and optimization efforts. Lead business User Acceptance Testing (UAT) for new system customizations. Develop and maintain comprehensive documentation on best practices, system architecture, procedures, customizations, and requirements. Design custom reports, dashboards, and KPIs to provide actionable insights to various departments. Facilitate business intelligence reporting and manage external data integrations. Offer training and support to users, ensuring the effective utilization of the NetSuite system. Serve as the go-to subject matter expert for all NetSuite-related inquiries and support needs Key Competencies:  The ideal candidate should have the following competencies: Strategic Vision. Building organizational capacity. Results driven. Embrace change. Collaboration and Influence. Entrepreneurial spirit. Customer value and Market focus. Skills and Qualifications:   At least 2 years of proven experience in a NetSuite Administrator role or similar. Proficient in NetSuite configuration, customization, and scripting. Candidates with NetSuite Administrator and Suite Foundation Certification will be given special consideration. Solid understanding of accounting principles and financial systems. Exceptional problem-solving capabilities and meticulous attention to detail. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with fluency in English. Ability to work both independently and as part of a team. Deep understanding of functional business processes. Looking for people with JavaScript experience and will be happy to offer training towards the certification for Suite Cloud Developer (A combination of Suite Foundation, Application Developer, and Web Services Developer certifications) This position reports directly to the Director of NetSuite and Emerging Technologies based in the US. This is an exciting opportunity for career development within a growing, global company. If you areambitious and positive with good customer service, communication, and administration skills, this is therole for you! Additional Information: Work times are flexible, with a focus on Afternoon/Evening hours to align with India Standard Time. Starting at 4 P.M. (IST) and working for 8.5 hours. To Staffing and Recruiting Agencies:  Optimas does not accept unsolicited CVs or applications from agencies. Optimas is not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited CVs or applications and explicitly reserve its right to contact candidates presented in such unsolicited CV or application.
column11: Script Writing, UAT, Netsuite Scripting, Troubleshooting, Oracle Netsuite

column2: Job Description:  We are seeking a dynamic and experienced SAP CRM Lead to join our team. ?As a SAP CRM Senior Professional, you will be responsible for leading the design, configuration, and implementation of SAP CRM solutions to meet the evolving needs of our organization. You will collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to ensure the successful deployment and ongoing support of SAP CRM modules, including Sales, Marketing, and Service.    Responsibilities  : 1. Leading full lifecycle SAP CRM implementation projects, from requirement gathering and solution design to testing, deployment, and post-implementation support. 2.Configuring and customizing SAP CRM functionalities to align with business processes and objectives, ensuring optimal system performance and user experience. 3.Providing subject matter expertise in SAP CRM modules, including Sales Order Management, Opportunity Management, Marketing Campaign Management, Service Ticketing, and Interaction Center. 4.Collaborating with business stakeholders to understand requirements, identify opportunities for process improvement, and translate business needs into technical solutions. 5.Conducting end-user training and providing ongoing support to ensure effective utilization of SAP CRM systems. 6.Performing system enhancements, data migrations, and system integrations to extend the capabilities of SAP CRM and maximize its value to the organization. 7.Leading and mentoring junior team members, sharing best practices, and fostering a culture of continuous learning and development. Requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or related field. 5+ years of hands-on experience with SAP CRM implementation and support, including at least 2 years in a senior or lead role. Proficiency in configuring and customizing SAP CRM modules, with expertise in Sales, Marketing, and Service functionalities. Strong technical skills in SAP CRM development, including knowledge of ABAP programming, CRM Web UI framework, and CRM middleware. Proven experience leading cross-functional teams and managing full lifecycle SAP CRM projects. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively collaborate with business stakeholders, technical teams, and external partners. Strong problem-solving abilities and a proactive approach to identifying and resolving technical issues. SAP CRM certification(s) preferred.

column2: Job Title: Portfolio Manager  Digital Banking and Payments Location: Saudi Arabia (Onsite) Job Description: We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Portfolio Manager specializing in digital banking, payments, forex, SWIFT, RTGS, and online payments to join our team in Saudi Arabia. The ideal candidate will be responsible for managing portfolios related to digital banking initiatives, payment solutions, and foreign exchange services, ensuring alignment with strategic objectives and regulatory requirements. Responsibilities: Portfolio Management: Develop and manage portfolios related to digital banking, payments, forex, and related areas. Define investment strategies, asset allocation, and risk management frameworks for the portfolios. Monitor portfolio performance, conduct regular reviews, and make necessary adjustments to optimize returns and manage risks. Digital Banking and Payments Expertise: Stay updated on industry trends, emerging technologies, and regulatory developments in digital banking and payments. Evaluate digital banking solutions, payment platforms, and online payment gateways for inclusion in the portfolio. Collaborate with internal teams and external partners to implement digital banking and payment initiatives effectively. Forex and International Payments: Oversee forex trading activities and manage exposure to currency risks within the portfolio. Monitor international payment channels, including SWIFT and RTGS, to ensure efficient and secure cross-border transactions. Develop hedging strategies and mechanisms to mitigate forex risks associated with international transactions. Risk Management and Compliance: Implement robust risk management frameworks to identify, assess, and mitigate risks associated with digital banking, payments, and forex activities. Ensure compliance with regulatory requirements, including AML (Anti-Money Laundering) and KYC (Know Your Customer) regulations. Conduct periodic audits and reviews to assess compliance with internal policies and external regulations. Strategic Planning and Stakeholder Management: Collaborate with senior management to align portfolio strategies with overall business objectives and market dynamics. Engage with key stakeholders, including regulatory authorities, banking partners, and technology vendors, to foster strategic partnerships and drive business growth. Requirements: Bachelor's degree in Finance, Economics, Business Administration, or related field. MBA or advanced degree preferred. Proven experience as a Portfolio Manager or similar role, with a focus on digital banking, payments, forex, and related areas. In-depth knowledge of digital banking technologies, payment systems, and forex markets. Familiarity with international payment protocols, including SWIFT and RTGS. Strong analytical skills and proficiency in financial modeling and risk assessment. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to interact effectively with internal teams and external partners. Ability to work independently, prioritize tasks, and meet deadlines in a dynamic environment. Relevant certifications such as CFA (Chartered Financial Analyst) or FRM (Financial Risk Manager) preferred. Fluency in English is required. Arabic language proficiency is a plus.

column2: As a    Manager - Oracle Supply Chain Management Practice    at AST, youll step into a world of innovation and transformation. This role isnt just about numbers; its about making a tangible impact on businesses operational health. Youll be at the forefront of change management, guiding organizations as they embrace new technologies and processes.            Key Responsibilities:               Client Collaboration   : Collaborate closely with clients to understand their Supply Chain Management business needs and objectives. Conduct thorough assessments to identify opportunities for process improvement.            Requirements Analysis   : Gather and analyze client requirements, translating them into comprehensive Oracle Supply Chain Management solutions. Provide expert guidance to align Oracle Supply Chain Management functionalities with client goals.            Solution Design   : Develop robust, scalable, and tailored Oracle Supply Chain Management solutions. Design end-to-end Supply Chain Management processes, including but not limited to Procurement, Inventory, Costing & Order Management.            Configuration and Implementation   : Lead the design, configuration and implementation of Oracle Supply Chain Management modules, ensuring seamless integration with existing systems. Customize Oracle Supply Chain Management to meet specific client needs.            Testing and Quality Assurance   : Plan and execute comprehensive testing strategies, including unit testing, integration testing, and user acceptance testing. Ensure the solution meets all functional and performance requirements.            Training and Documentation   : Provide training to client teams on Oracle Supply Chain Management functionality, best practices, and system maintenance. Create clear and user-friendly documentation for clients to reference.            Support and Maintenance   : Offer ongoing support and maintenance for Oracle Supply Chain Management implementations. Address and resolve issues, perform regular system health checks, and implement upgrades when necessary.            Change Management   : Assist clients in managing change within their organizations by helping them adapt to new financial processes and technologies. Ensure a smooth transition from legacy systems to Oracle Supply Chain Management.            Troubleshooting   : Act as a subject matter expert in troubleshooting complex financial issues and challenges. Identify root causes and implement effective solutions promptly.            Best Practices   : Stay up to date with Oracle Supply Chain Management best practices, industry trends, and updates. Recommend and implement improvements to maximize efficiency and productivity.            Pre-sales and CoE contribution   : Contribute to the pre-sale s effort through differentiated solution offerings and estimation exercise. Contribute meaningfully to the creation of assets that will help AST come up with differentiated solutions and offerings in the marketplace.              What We re Looking For:             Bachelor s degree in engineering or a related field. MBA or relevant certifications (e.g., Oracle Certified Supply Chain Consultant) preferred.          Experience of managing Oracle Supply Chain Management Practice, with a minimum of 5 years in Oracle Supply Chain Management implementation and support with least 2 full cycle implementations on Oracle Cloud Procurement / Inventory / Costing / Order Management implementations as Module Lead          In-depth knowledge of Oracle Supply Chain Management modules, including Procurement, Inventory, Costing, & Order Management.          Blueprinting, designing, and rolling out solutions to end users in Procurement, Inventory, Costing, & Order Management. Ability to assist clients in the selection, implementation, and support of SCM solutions. Liaise between the customer, development team and any third-party vendor regarding software functionality, throughout the development/implementation lifecycle.          Experience in Oracle Cloud Overall Supply Chain suite modules and specifically in Oracle Procurement / Inventory / Costing / Order Management and the integration points with other modules such as manufacturing, maintenance and financials.          Strong understanding of Supply Chain Management processes and accounting principles.          Experience in Business Process Consulting, problem definition, facilitating global design workshops, business process analysis, providing subject matter guidance, system integration testing, training, and production deployment.          Exceptional problem-solving and analytical skills.          Excellent communication and interpersonal abilities, with the capacity to collaborate effectively with clients and cross-functional teams.          Ability to lead projects, manage stakeholders, and meet project deadlines.

column2: The primary responsibility includes Collaboratively execute the partnerships function to build urgency and criticality on the importance of Thriving in the ecosystem. Through developing strategic partnerships and leading the advocacy efforts of the organisation, build a movement to equip millions of young people from vulnerable backgrounds to overcome adversity and thrive in the 21st century.               Roles and Responsibilities                 Liaise with government officials and other stakeholders for adopting Thriving as purpose of education.              Support in achieving in organisational goal. Establishing strategic partnership with the state education system for demonstrating system on Thriving as purpose of education.              Implementation of strategic direction of the function. Develop strong professional nexus with policymakers, administrators and executors for discovering, dreaming, designing and delivery of curriculum focusing on thriving, specifically Life Skills, Socio-Emotional Learning and Value education         Manage all ongoing activities of Happiness curriculum, Delhi. Also, regularly hunting for innovations focusing Life Skills activities, components of SEL and values to be incorporated in Happiness curriculum after prior approval from concerned officials.              Liaison and exploration of opportunities for advocating facilitation skills of teachers through trainings.             To liaise with Department of Education, Government of Delhi for contextualization of Life Skills curriculum of Dream a Dream so that it could reach to maximum number of children.             Manage a large team and complex function. Providing direction and support to the team members within the function.              Coordinate with and support the external stakeholders (NGOs, research agencies and Government) to build a life skills focused approach in their work.             Provide support to the internal teams in research and M&E work as well as to build an     ecosystem premised on life skills approach.         Managing and maintaining database on key policy and advocacy issues related to different vertical of education, child and youth development, Life Skills, SEL and Thriving.                 Skills                 Should have experience and skills for the function.             Should have considerable knowledge and possess proven technical skills.             Strong managerial experience in terms of independently managing the function.              Leadership and mentoring skills.              Prior engagement with young people and experience in education, Life skills or Socio Emotional Learning is highly recommended.             Experience in leading teams, liaisoning with government officials and project management is desirable.             Strong spoken and written communication and articulation skills. Fluency in English and Hindi is must. Knowledge of other Indian language in reference to geography of work is appreciable.              Ability to travel to different parts of country (towns and villages) at a short notice, in       post Covid era.              Excellent problem-solving and strategic thinking skills, ability to analyse complex qualitative and quantitative data, craft possible solutions and recommend actions.             Intermediate knowledge and use of Microsoft Excel, Word and PowerPoint.                 General Responsibilities                 Contribute to achievement of strategic goals set by the organization             Participate in strategic planning, annual planning and budgeting process for the organization             Develop strategies to keep team members engaged in outreach efforts             Being a small team, you would also be required to multi-task between roles given by your reporting manager, as and when required by the organisation for the furtherance of its goals             Accountability of achieving the goal of the functions.                       EXPERIENCE         More than 8 years of experience of working in development sector, majorly in Education. Hand on Life Skills & Socio-Emotional Learning will be preferred.     Prior experience of working with Government will be an added advantage.

Use deep technical expertise, business acumen and fluid communication skills, work directly with a client in a trusted advisor relationship to gather requirements to analyze, design and/or implement technology best practice business changes.  Must have skills : SAP SuccessFactors Employee Central Good to have skills : NA Minimum  3  year(s) of experience is required Educational Qualification : 15 Years Continuous education  Summary :As a Tech Delivery Subject Matter Expert for SAP SuccessFactors Employee Central, you will be responsible for driving innovative practices into delivery and bringing depth of expertise to a delivery engagement. Your typical day will involve working directly with clients in a trusted advisor relationship to gather requirements, analyze, design, and/or implement technology best practice business changes.  Roles & Responsibilities: Lead the design and implementation of SAP SuccessFactors Employee Central solutions for clients, ensuring alignment with business requirements and best practices. Provide expert guidance and support to clients on SAP SuccessFactors Employee Central functionality, including configuration, integration, and data migration. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure successful delivery of SAP SuccessFactors Employee Central solutions, including working with developers, testers, and project managers. Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in SAP SuccessFactors Employee Central and related technologies, integrating innovative approaches for sustained competitive advantage. Professional & Technical Skills: Must To Have Skills:Expertise in SAP SuccessFactors Employee Central. Good To Have Skills:Knowledge of related SAP SuccessFactors modules such as Performance & Goals, Compensation, and Learning. Strong understanding of HR business processes and best practices. Experience with SAP SuccessFactors Employee Central configuration, integration, and data migration. Experience collaborating with cross-functional teams, including developers, testers, and project managers. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to work directly with clients in a trusted advisor relationship. Additional Information: The candidate should have a minimum of 3 years of experience in SAP SuccessFactors Employee Central. The ideal candidate will possess a strong educational background in computer science, information systems, or a related field, along with a proven track record of delivering impactful SAP SuccessFactors Employee Central solutions. This position is based at our Hyderabad office. Qualification 15 Years Continuous education

column2: Short description: We are looking for an experienced Consulting professional and Project Manager with exposure to handling multicultural international stakeholders who has hands on implementation experience and / or development expertise on Core Banking solutions, domain expertise within Banking business modules or technologies relevant to Banking applications. This manager-level position is responsible segment within a given practice focused on a specific industry, service line, technology center, specialty area or region. Responsible for leading the three main pillars of a practice: people management, portfolio/delivery management and sales enablement. Has profit and loss responsibility or financial/expense management of practice.   The business - Oracle Financial Services Consulting: Oracle Financial Services Global Business Unit (FSGBU) is a world leader in providing IT solutions to the Financial Services industry. Oracles customers include ten of the top ten Global Banks, Insurance companies, Securities firms, five of the top five Mutual Fund companies and four of the top five World Stock Exchanges. With the experience of delivering value-based IT solutions to over 840 financial institutions in over 130 countries, the FSGBU understands the specific challenges that financial institutions face: the need for building customer intimacy and competitive advantage through cost-effective solutions while, simultaneously, adhering to the stringent demands of a dynamic regulatory environment. Our solutions have the world's most comprehensive and contemporary banking applications and provide a technology footprint that addresses their complex IT and business requirements. Banking Consulting Europe which is a part of EMEA Region under FSGBU - Consulting delivers Oracle Technology and Applications solutions for clientele in the European region. The service offerings include Application Implementation, Managed Services and Customization development services for Oracle Financial Services Software Banking products. Opportunity: This gives an opportunity to apply Project Management knowledge, skills and experience to work in the Banking Consulting team with a new generation of Oracle Banking products in next generation architecture built leveraging the latest technologies.   Experience:  12+ years of experience relevant to this position including 6 years of Consulting experience and 4 years of Project Management leadership experience. Experience in development and / or implementation and / or support of Core Banking applications.   Primary Skills: Lead, engage, mobilize and motivate multiple teams to accomplish goals in Core-Banking Product and Technology Implementations, Development and Support domains. Expertise in planning and execution of projects covering entire SDLC from initial RFP / Product Walkthrough workshops with prospects, Design of customizations, Coding and Unit testing, performing Test cycle rounds including End of Days, migrations and Integrations for Oracle FLEXCUBE / Core banking products. Possess working knowledge and skills in software programming working with cloud tools, technologies and framework and understanding of solutions, industry standard methodologies, multiple business processes or technology designs within Core Banking domain. Good problem solving, troubleshooting & communication skills. Good client interaction skills in PM areas including presentation of solutions Good skills on Microsoft Office, MS Excel, Powerpoint Good communication & documentation skills in English Secondary Skills Have exposure to Automation of Software Development and Testing processes, Agile Development practice, DevOps tools, Automated-Testing tools Possess knowledge of Oracle OBIEE Reports, BIP, middleware such as Oracle Fusion SOA Suite Aware of Microservices based technologies in Banking!   Work Environment:  Work at offshore as well as travel to client locations Willing to take up FLEXCUBE Technical certifications in functional areas as and when required. Ability to work in a high pressure, fast moving and challenging environment Should be able to work on shifts on rotation basis based on project needs Accountable for operational/financial metrics and overall business results of practice. Responsible for maintaining practice direction, ensuring quality of consulting delivery, and maintaining customer reference-ability. Ensures that operational policies are followed and that business objectives are achieved by focusing on standard methodologies and process improvements. Develops plans to successfully implement operational policies and achieves business plan. Is accountable for managing and growing a revenue stream and customer base. Typically manages individual contributors. May serve as advisor for moderately complex engagements.   Responsibilities include: Providing quality work products on customer engagements while handling a small team of consultants Project planning and tracking: Lead Oracle and partner resources and track all project results. Pro-active identification and mitigation of project risks and manage client and Oracle issues. Participate in the decision-making process for all system changes and designs. Use defined standards/tools/processes to achieve deliverables that meet quality expectations of Oracle / Client. Adhere to defined Change Control Process of Oracle / Client. Align with Oracle / Client audit / Compliance requirements. Mentor and guide the team along with providing trainings, conducting performance reviews as applicable. Participate in pre-sales activities and contribute towards generating business to consulting. Performs varied and complex duties and tasks that need independent judgment, in order to implement Oracle products and technology to meet customer needs. Applies Oracle methodology, company procedures, and leading practices in demonstrating expertise to deliver functional and technical solutions on moderately complex customer engagements.  May lead the solution design and implementation aspects of engagement(s) ensuring high quality, integrated software solutions within constraints of time and budget. Effectively collaborates with management of customer organizations.
column11: Flexcube, OBDX, Project Management

column2: Agile Project Management (14225719) Level - 09 - 9 CDC2E Summary: As an Application Developer, you will be responsible for designing, building, and configuring applications to meet business process and application requirements using Agile Project Management methodologies. Your typical day will involve working with cross-functional teams, collaborating with stakeholders, and delivering high-quality software solutions.  Roles & Responsibilities:  - Lead the design, development, and implementation of software applications using Agile Project Management methodologies.  - Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including business analysts, project managers, and software engineers, to deliver high-quality software solutions.  - Ensure software applications meet business process and application requirements, adhering to coding standards and best practices.  - Conduct code reviews, debugging, and troubleshooting to ensure software quality and integrity.  - Stay updated with the latest advancements in software engineering, integrating innovative approaches for sustained competitive advantage.  Professional & Technical Skills:  - Must To Have Skills: Strong experience in Agile Project Management methodologies.  - Good To Have Skills: Experience with software development life cycle (SDLC) methodologies, such as Waterfall or DevOps.  - Solid understanding of software engineering principles, including software design patterns, data structures, and algorithms.  - Experience with programming languages such as Java, C++, or Python.  - Experience with software development tools such as Git, JIRA, or Jenkins.  - Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to troubleshoot complex software issues.  Additional Information:  - The candidate should have a minimum of 5 years of experience in Agile Project Management.  - The ideal candidate will possess a strong educational background in computer science, software engineering, or a related field, along with a proven track record of delivering impactful software solutions.  - This position is based at our Chennai office.

column2: Project Role : Business Process Architect Project Role Description : Design business processes, including characteristics and key performance indicators (KPIs), to meet process and functional requirements. Assist in quality management reviews, ensure all business and design requirements are met. Educate stakeholders to ensure a complete understanding of the designs.  Must have skills : General Electric (GE) Application Performance Management (APM) Good to have skills : Downstream Marketing Minimum  12  year(s) of experience is required Educational Qualification : BE MTech MBA Summary :As a Business Process Architect, you will be responsible for designing business processes, including characteristics and key performance indicators (KPIs), to meet process and functional requirements. Your typical day will involve working closely with the Application Architect to create the process blueprint and establish business process requirements to drive out application requirements and metrics. You will also assist in quality management reviews and ensure all business and design requirements are met. Additionally, you will educate stakeholders to ensure a complete understanding of the designs.  Roles & Responsibilities: Design business processes, including characteristics and key performance indicators (KPIs), to meet process and functional requirements. Work closely with the Application Architect to create the process blueprint and establish business process requirements to drive out application requirements and metrics. Assist in quality management reviews and ensure all business and design requirements are met. Educate stakeholders to ensure a complete understanding of the designs. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure successful implementation of business processes. Professional & Technical Skills: Must To Have Skills:Experience in General Electric (GE) Application Performance Management (APM). Good To Have Skills:Experience in Downstream Marketing. Strong understanding of business process design and implementation. Experience in quality management reviews. Excellent communication and collaboration skills. Additional Information: The candidate should have a minimum of 12 years of experience in General Electric (GE) Application Performance Management (APM). The ideal candidate will possess a strong educational background in business process architecture, computer science, or a related field, along with a proven track record of delivering impactful solutions. This position is based at our Bengaluru office. Qualification BE MTech MBA

column1: Exciting opportunity For Bangalore SAP Sustainability Professional
column2: About EY GDS:  EY Global Delivery Services (GDS) is a global organization delivering services across Assurance, Consulting, Strategy and Transactions, and Tax to our clients. With our worldwide presence and deep industry experience, we provide high-quality services to help businesses navigate their complex challenges and achieve their goals.     Role & responsibilities SAP Sustainability Solutions Expertise: Demonstrated experience with SAP Sustainability Footprint Management, Sustainability Control Tower, and SAP RDP, with a strong understanding of sustainability practices and regulations. SAP S/4HANA and SAP HANA Modelling Proficiency: Extensive knowledge of SAP S/4HANA ERP systems and SAP HANA Modelling, including experience with SAP Datasphere, to support robust data management and analytics. Advanced Analytics and Reporting: Proficiency in creating stories, dashboards, and BI reports using SAP Analytics Cloud (SAC), including skills in data modelling and visualization to derive actionable insights. Project Management and Leadership: A minimum of 5 years of experience in executing SAP implementation projects, with a focus on sustainability and analytics. Proven ability to manage projects from initiation through to completion, ensuring alignment with business objectives. Strategic Planning: Ability to develop and implement strategic plans that integrate sustainability and analytics solutions within business operations, ensuring compliance, operational efficiency, and impactful sustainability reporting. Communication and Collaboration: Excellent communication skills for effectively engaging stakeholders at various levels, coupled with strong collaboration abilities to work within cross-functional teams. Qualifications Should have experience (Sustainability OR RDP OR SFM OR SCT OR ESG) AND SAP AND (Analytics OR "data modelling" OR "Power BI" OR SAC OR datasphere) AND SAP Bachelor's or master's degree in engineering or related field from an accredited college or university. At least 3-7 years of professional experience with a focus on SAP sustainability solutions (SCT/SFM/RDP), S/4HANA ERP systems, SAP HANA Modelling, SAP Datasphere and SAC. Certifications related to SAP SCT, SFM, RDP, SAC or SAP S4 HANA are desirable. Strong analytical and problem-solving capabilities, with a proactive approach to tackling sustainability challenges. Excellent teamwork and collaboration skills, with a commitment to innovation and continuous improvement in the sustainability domain. Interested kindly share your updated resume to malathi.ramadoss@gds.ey.com  Also apply to this below link https://careers.ey.com/job-invite/1487099/

column2: Job Title: A-con/ Con/Assistant ManagerFunction: IT -Audit    Location: Bengaluru >> OVERVIEW KPMG in India, a professional services firm, is the Indian member firm affiliated with KPMG International and was established in September 1993. Our professionals leverage the global network of firms, providing detailed knowledge of local laws, regulations, markets, and competition. KPMG has offices across India in Ahmedabad, Bengaluru, Chandigarh, Chennai, Gurugram, Hyderabad, Jaipur, Kochi, Kolkata, Mumbai, Noida, Pune, and Vadodara. KPMG in India offers services to national and international clients in India across sectors. We strive to provide rapid, performance-based, industry-focussed, and technology-enabled services, which reflect a shared knowledge of global and local industries and our experience of the Indian business environmentKPMG Advisory professionals provide advice and assistance to enable companies, intermediaries, and public sector bodies to mitigate risk, improve performance, and create value. KPMG firms provide a wide range of Risk Advisory and Financial Advisory Services that can help clients respond to immediate needs as well as put in place the strategies for the longer term.Projects in IT Advisory focus on the assessment and/or evaluation of IT systems and the mitigation of IT-related business risks. They are either IS audit, SOX reviews, Internal audit engagements, IT infrastructure review and/or risk advisory including but not limited to IT audit supports in nature.  EOE KI : KPMG India has a policy of providing equal opportunity for all applicants and employees regardless of their color, caste, religion, age, sex/gender, national origin, citizenship, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, disability or other legally protected status. KPMG India values diversity and we request you to submit the details below to support us in our endeavor for diversity. Providing the below information is voluntary and refusal to submit such information will not be prejudicial to you. Skills Required: Risk Based IT Internal Audit for Financial Services Entities IT SOX 404 Controls Testing, Quality Assurance Internal Financial Controls related to IT General Controls as part of Financial Statements Audits IT Risk & Control Self-Assessment  Business Systems Controls / IT Application Controls  Auditing Emerging Technologies such as Cloud Security, Intelligent Automation, RPA, IoT etc. Working knowledge of programming languages(C/C++/Java/SQL) Responsibilities Collaborate with other members of the engagement team to plan the engagement and develop relevant workpapers/deliverables.  Perform fieldwork and share the daily progress of fieldwork, informing supervisors of engagement status. Perform testing of IT Application Controls, IPE, and Interface Controls through code reviews, IT General Controls review covering areas such as Change Management, Access Management, Backup Management, Incident and Problem Management, SDLC, Data Migration, Batch Job scheduling/monitoring and Business Continuity and Disaster Recovery Perform Risk Assessment, identification, and Evaluation of Controls, prepare process flow diagrams and document the same in Risk & Control Matrix.  Perform business process walkthrough and controls testing for IT Audits. Performing planning and executing audits, including:  Information Security reviews  Information Technology Infrastructure reviews ??Application reviews  Use knowledge of the current IT environment and industry IT trends to identify the engagement and client service issues and communicate this information to the project manager. Maintain relationships with client management and the project Manager to manage expectations of service, including work products, timing, and deliverables. Demonstrate a thorough understanding of complex information systems and apply it to client situations. column1: GN - Industry - MC - Energy Downstream - Consultant
column2: Practice Overview: Resources is one of the Industry Practices within Accenture's Capability Network (CN) team. It focuses on serving clients across four specific Industry Groups (IGs) Energy, Chemicals, Utilities, and Natural Resources. Energy  Focuses on the entire energy value chain within Oil & Gas, and specializes across business areas within Upstream, Downstream, Oil Field Services, Renewables, etc. Utilities  Advice and lead client engagements in wide variety of strategy and operational transformation topics across the overall value chain within the Utilities industry including Retail, Transmission & Distribution, Generation etc. Chemicals  Focuses on Basic, Specialty, and Fine Chemicals industries across domains (and not limited to) including Commercial Excellence , Supply Chain Optimization, Operations Excellence, Process Readiness and Capital Projects Management Natural Resources  Focuses on Metals, Mining, Forest Products, Building Materials industries across multiple domains (and not limited to) including Supply Chain Optimization, Operations Excellence, Operations Management, Pricing & Profitability Analysis etc. In addition to serving the four IGs, there are other cross-industry capabilities designed to address the needs of Resources clients. These are: Digital Plant  is a suite of offerings designed for asset-intensive companies across all Resources industries. Platforms  is an innovative, comprehensive and proven approach that helps companies across multiple industries accelerate enterprise-wide business value for high performance and lasting competitive advantage. Skill/Operating Group Resources Energy Downstream Level Analyst/Consultant Location Gurgaon/Mumbai/Bangalore Travel Percentage Expected Travel could be anywhere between 25-75% Principal Duties  And Responsibilities: Candidate should be able to lead lubricant and refinery engagements throughout the downstream value chain Candidate will be required to document business process, develop functional requirements, operating models, supply chain and any other deliverables as required specifically for lubricant industry. Candidate should demonstrate strong downstream and lubricant industry expertise having an in-depth knowledge of various software products and their value proposition to plan and drive growth strategies with CN Downstream practice by identifying potential customers that would need services. Candidate will carry a quota to achieve on periodical basis. Initiate conversations with decision makers, qualify and manage inquiries, identify and understand business needs, and create new business opportunities within an assigned territory/ Accounts. Candidate will be required to work in a client-facing role with global exposure to manage internal clients while navigating different cultural nuances. Candidate will be required to travel to the customer site to work on projects for extended periods of time. Experience: Around 2 - 8 years of experience relevant experience in the following areas: Extensive domain knowledge in the following areas:Lubricant industry (Lubricants, Greases, Specialty Oils, Waxes etc.) and refinery industry. Consulting experience with at least 2 years in any consulting firm is required Familiarity with the lubricant supply chain process, maintenance process, business process pertaining to operations, packaging, blending, recipe management etc. Experience in handling industrial lubricants sales and marketing, route to market transformation, customer value management, existing customers and get new customers, growing existing channel through efficient relationship management. Should have handled implementation and product development activities and report daily activities to the client stakeholders. Must have experience on planning and estimating lubes pricing and customer management tools development and Implementation activities. Candidate should have the capability to lead various teams involved in product implementation or product development. Demonstrated ability in planning consulting/functional work, managing stakeholders, ownership of project outcomes. Should have strong analytical and problem -solving skills Hands on and functional expertise in areas like Power BI, Tableau, data analytics, Machine Learning etc. are an added advantage Strong foundational skills - written and oral business communication, stakeholder management, forward planning.

column2: We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced SAP Transportation Management (SAP TM) Consultant to join our team      As an SAP TM Consultant, you will play a crucial role in driving client workshops, preparing design documents, and designing solutions to optimize transportation management processes      You will collaborate closely with clients to understand their business needs, provide expert guidance on SAP TM solutions, and ensure successful project implementation              Roles and Responsibilities:        1. Client Workshop Facilitation:      - Lead and facilitate client workshops to gather and analyze transportation management requirements.      - Collaborate with key stakeholders to identify pain points and business objectives.      2. Solution Design:      - Utilize your expertise in SAP TM to design innovative and efficient transportation management solutions.      - Develop comprehensive design documents outlining the proposed solutions, including process flows, system configurations, and integration requirements.      3. Client Engagement:      - Establish and maintain strong client relationships by serving as a trusted advisor.      - Communicate effectively with clients to ensure a clear understanding of project goals and expectations.      4. Project Planning:      - Contribute to project planning by providing input on timelines, resource allocation, and deliverables related to SAP TM implementation.      5. Configuration and Customization:      - Configure SAP TM modules to meet specific client requirements, ensuring alignment with best practices.      - If necessary, develop custom solutions to address unique transportation management challenges.      6. Testing and Quality Assurance:      - Collaborate with the testing team to ensure comprehensive testing of SAP TM solutions.      - Conduct thorough quality assurance checks to verify the accuracy and functionality of configured systems.      7. Documentation and Training:      - Create user manuals, training materials, and documentation to support end-users in adopting SAP TM solutions.      - Provide training and guidance to clients and internal teams as needed.      8. Troubleshooting and Support:      - Address and resolve any issues or challenges that arise during SAP TM implementation.      - Offer ongoing support to clients post-implementation to ensure system stability and performance.      9. Stay Current with SAP TM Trends:      - Stay updated on the latest trends, best practices, and updates within the SAP TM landscape.      - Continuously expand your knowledge to provide cutting-edge solutions to clients.            Qualifications:            - Bachelor's degree in a relevant field (such as Computer Science, Information Technology, or Business).      - Proven experience as an SAP Transportation Management (SAP TM) Consultant.      - Strong knowledge of SAP TM modules and their integration with other SAP modules.      - Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.      - Problem-solving abilities and attention to detail.      - Project management skills and the ability to work in a team.      - SAP certification in Transportation Management (preferred).      - Willingness to travel to client sites as needed (if applicable).                Required Skills SAP, TM, Transportation Management
column11: Training, SAP, Manager Quality Assurance, Project management, Resource allocation, Transport management, Project planning, Troubleshooting, Information technology

e.g website checkout shipping options,legal preferences and monitor these KPI s                         Support setting business logic configurations across various platforms - commerce cloud, product information master etc.                        Project Management                       Support operationally focused projects or enhancement requests with our local global teams                       Day to Day Operations                       Support as first level of escalation for local market business functions                         Monitor coordinate with IT Service Managers for ticket resolution and relay communications to relevant stakeholders                         Ensure the success of the eCommerce Platform operations strategy through constant monitoring of the operational KPI s (conversion, checkout drop-off, transaction fees and order processing)                         Support in managing ecommerce data across all the different platforms (inventory, shipping costs etc.) - column2: Armanino India LLP Position:  Dynamics 365 F&SC Developer Lead  Product & Innovation Team Business Unit:  Consulting Location:  Ahmedabad, India Employment type:  FTE, Remote About the firm  Armanino LLP (USA) is proud to beamong the top 20 Largest Firms in the United States of Americaand one of theBest Places to Work. Armanino LLP (USA) has more than 2500 employees across the USA and more than 20 offices in difference states of the USA. We have a community of resources that are ready and willing to support your ideas, build your skills and expand your professional network. We want you to integrate all aspects of your life with your career. At Armanino, we know you don?? check-out of life when you check-in at work. That?? why we??e created a unique work environment where your passions, work, and family & friends can overlap. We want to help you achieve growth by giving you access to a network of smart and supportive people, willing to listen to your ideas.  This open position is for Armanino India LLP, which is located in Ahmedabad, Gujarat, India. Armanino India LLP is a fully owned subsidiary of Armanino LLP (USA). The Dynamics 365 F&SC Developer will be responsible for developing, customizing, and maintaining the Armanino High Tech and Life Sciences ISV solutions. They will work closely with other team members to resolve issues reported by delivery and support teams.  Job Responsibilities   Design, develop, and implement customizations and extensions in Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations. Participate in the release management process by assembling, documenting, and packaging product releases for distribution. Provide technical support and troubleshooting for Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations issues. Analyze and resolve application defects, ensuring optimal system performance. Co-ordinate with analysts and subject matter experts to enhance existing applications. Support our product team by analyzing and debugging reported problems. Provide technical education to team members regarding updates, features, and new technologies. Qualifications & Experience Requirements: Possess a BA/BS degree from an accredited College/University in Accounting, Business, Computer Science, or equivalent work experience. Minimum 5 years of hands-on experience in Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations (F&O) development, including proficiency in X++ and SQL. Experience with Azure DevOps, Code Branching, Merging etc. Demonstrated experience in product releases and post-release support. The ideal candidate will have the following: Technical Skills:  X++ Programming: Proficiency in X++, the object-oriented programming language used by Dynamics 365 F&SC for customizations.  Visual Studio: Experience in using Visual Studio for development tasks such as debugging, creating models, and managing code.  Data Management: Understanding of the Data Management Framework (DMF), entities, and data management tools.  SQL Server: Skills in managing databases, writing queries, and understanding the underlying data structure of Dynamics 365 F&SC.   Power Platform: Knowledge of Power Apps, Power BI, and Power Automate to extend Dynamics 365 capabilities.  Azure DevOps: Familiarity with Azure DevOps for version control, continuous integration, and deployment. Familiarity with Git and TFS a plus.  Integrations: Experience with creating and managing integrations using data entities, OData, custom services, and external web services.  Performance Tuning: Ability to optimize performance through code review and understanding the impact on database and application performance. Ability to analyze queries and implement performance improvements.  Lifecycle Services (LCS): Experience with LCS for application lifecycle management and automated testing.  Security Configuration: Understanding of role-based security in Dynamics 365 and how to implement and manage security settings.  Design and Develop: Create product-level solutions to specific problems encountered by customers and / or testers.  Experience with ISV solutions.  Deployment: Understanding the deployment process for Dynamics 365 F&SC across development, test, and production environments. Functional Knowledge:  Business Processes: Understanding of finance, supply chain, and operations processes that Dynamics 365 F&SC supports, and their technical functionality.  Module Expertise: Knowledge of specific modules such as finance, procurement & sourcing, inventory management, and sales & marketing.  Regulatory and Compliance: Awareness of regional regulatory requirements and compliance settings within the system. Soft Skills:  Problem-Solving: Ability to troubleshoot and solve complex issues that arise during development or post-implementation.  Communication: Clear communication skills to collaborate with team members, stakeholders, and clients.  Analytical Thinking: The ability to understand complex systems and business needs to provide effective solutions.  Continuous Learning: Keeping up-to-date with the latest updates and features released by Microsoft for Dynamics 365.  Project Management: Familiarity with project management principles to deliver tasks in a timely and organized manner.  Agility: Ability to track multiple deliverables and switch between them as needed. Preferred Certifications:  MB-330: Microsoft Dynamics 365 Supply Chain Management Functional Consultant Associate  MB-500: Microsoft Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations Apps Developer Compensation and Benefits Compensation: Commensurate with Industry standards  Other Benefits:  Provident Fund, Gratuity, Medical Insurance, Group Personal Accident Insurance etc. employment benefits depending on the position. Armanino India LLP provides equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, disability or genetics. Armanino India LLP complies with applicable labor laws governing nondiscrimination in employment in every location in which the firm has facilities. This policy applies to all terms and conditions of employment, including recruiting, hiring, placement, promotion, termination, layoff, recall,transfer, leaves of absence, compensation and training.   Armanino India LLP expressly prohibits any form of workplace harassment based on race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, age, genetic information, disability, or veteran status.

column1: SAP OpenText Vendor Invoice Management (VIM) Consultant
column2: ?     We are seeking an experienced Senior SAP OpenText Vendor Invoice Management (VIM) Consultant with a minimum of 7 years of hands-on experience to join our team. As a Senior SAP VIM Consultant, you will be responsible for designing, implementing, and optimizing SAP VIM solutions for our clients. Your expertise will be crucial in streamlining invoice processing and document management, ensuring efficient and compliant financial operations.     Responsibilities:       Solution Design and Implementation:         Lead and contribute to the design and configuration of SAP VIM solutions, aligned with client requirements and industry best practices.     Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather business needs and translate them into effective SAP VIM solutions.     Configure SAP VIM settings, workflows, document types, data capture, and integration with SAP and non-SAP systems.     Customize SAP VIM functionalities to meet specific business processes and requirements.         Project Management and Delivery:         Lead end-to-end SAP VIM implementation projects, ensuring successful project delivery within defined scope, timelines, and budget.     Provide guidance and mentorship to junior consultants and project team members.     Define project milestones, deliverables, and manage stakeholder communication and expectations.         System Optimization and Support:         Perform regular assessments of SAP VIM systems to identify opportunities for process improvement, automation, and enhanced efficiency.     Provide post-implementation support, including troubleshooting, defect resolution, and performance optimization.     Collaborate with IT and business teams to ensure continuous system availability and reliability.         User Training and Knowledge Transfer:         Conduct training sessions for end-users and key stakeholders to ensure effective utilization of SAP VIM functionalities.     Create and maintain comprehensive documentation, including user guides, process flows, and configuration documentation.         Integration and Upgrades:         Collaborate with technical teams to integrate SAP VIM with other SAP modules, third-party applications, and external systems.     Stay updated on the latest SAP VIM enhancements, patches, and upgrades, and provide recommendations for system improvements.         Industry Expertise and Continuous Learning:         Stay informed about industry trends, regulatory changes, and best practices related to SAP VIM and document management. column1: Senior Analyst - Pricing Assurance (Cloud & Infrastructure Service)
column2: Job Overview This role is part of the Pricing Assurance practice, which assists buyers and service providers with pricing decisions in outsourcing arrangements. On the buy-side, the practice advises buyers on optimizing their sourcing spend by providing fair market price comparables for outsourced services, by understanding the delivery cost structures, and by rationalizing their IT-BPO portfolio. On the supply-side, the practice helps providers by providing price benchmarks vis-a-vis peers, identifying improvement opportunities in their delivery capabilities, understanding competitive operations and, and improving win-rates in outsourcing deals. The individual should have the capability to deliver analysis and advice to blue chip clients through written deliverables, consulting, client inquiry, and other deliverables. The candidate must be able to analyze, write, participate actively in the sales cycle, consult, present in front of large and small audiences, work with senior executives, develop complex and compelling scenarios, and work with clients solving strategic outsourcing issues. Strong Analytical skills and problem-solving ability underpins this role, as Pricing of complex deals has many moving parts. column2: As a Senior Associate, you ll work as part of a team of problem solvers with extensive consulting and industry experience, helping our clients solve their complex business issues from strategy to execution.      Specific responsibilities include but are not limited to:       Proactively assist in the management of several clients, while reporting to Managers and above     Train and lead staff     Establish effective working relationships directly with clients     Contribute to the development of your own and team s technical acumen     Keep up to date with local and national business and economic issues     Be actively involved in business development activities to help identify and research opportunities on new/existing clients      Continue to develop internal relationships and your PwC brand                       Job Description: SAP -Extended Warehouse Management (EWM)                                  EDUCATION AND QUALIFICATIONS/SKILLS AND COMPETENCIES                         Degree in Engineering (BE, BTech)                     SAP Certification in Warehouse Management (WM) and Extended Warehouse Management (EWM) as added advantages                                 Good integration knowledge with other components with SAP S/4HANA (WM, SD, MM) and other SAP or Non-SAP legacy applications                      Must have SAP EWM/WM Functional implementation experience / Roll out experience & Support Experience in EWM.                      Worked on S/4(integration with S/4 Hana system) as added advantages                     Must have worked on SAP EWM with RF environment                      Should have conducted      blue print     workshops at client site & expertise in implementing best practices.                                 Expecting Debugging skills to identify technical issue in WM & EWM modules                                     Roles & Responsibilities:                          Must have design and configuration experience in EWM/WM/LE module: Inbound/outbound/manufacturing process with Warehouse, VAS, Picking, Packing, HUM, Cross docking, Yard management, Labor management, Physical inventory, Shipment, Internal Warehouse EWM Processes and return process.                     Experienced in designing labels, Barcode Scanners, RF implementation with ITS Mobile.                                 Detailed knowledge of systems and business processes within SAP Supply Chain and Logistics Execution modules (EWM/WM) and other SAP cross functional experience in MM, PP&SD.                     Must have Integration experience SAP with non-SAP external systems (Supplier collaboration, 3PL, etc.) /internal legacy systems. Integration experience with SAP 3PL preferred.                     Must have experience in migrating data to SAP EWM & Post migration data validation/ Reconciliation in various Projects.                     Demonstrates strong knowledge and application of testing strategies, methodologies and has been responsible for executing unit, integration and user acceptance testing                     Proven ability to translate business requirements, processes and designs into well documented system designs and preparation business process global template.                                 Working experience with EWM queue management and resolutions.                     Good experience in LOSC/POSC.                     Good experience in all standard SAP EWM configurations including Warehouse org structure, Placement and removal strategies, Physical inventory, Print configurations.                     Working experience with Serial number and batch management.                     Working experience of cross-docking, wave/2-step picking etc.                                 Good to have experience on EWM Replenishment, Slotting & Rearrangement Processes.                     Strong analytical, problem solving and conceptual skills including the ability to express complex technical concepts in business terms                     A team player with excellent verbal and written communication skills, able to communicate clearly, ability to work both independently and as part of a team.                         Experience and Other Requirements:                         Domain knowledge in Supply Chain Management in the areas of Planning, Manufacturing & warehousing processes experiences are added advantages                                 Experience in SAP Material Flow Systems (MFS) or any other      third party     automation tools will be desirable                     Experience in EWM technical knowledge will be an added advantage                     Knowledge on SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud solution will be preferred                     Must have good understanding on S/4HANA Order to Cash and Procure to Pay business processes                      Must have knowledge of SAP ACTIVATE implementation methodology                                 Use of Solution Manager as a part of implementation life cycle is desirable                     Good Communication skill in English                         Key Performance Indicators                         Customer Feedback/customer satisfaction scores                     Productive days/utilization as defined by the organization                                 Knowledge Management and creation of effective reusable components                             Education: B Tech, M.Tech, MBA, M.com, B.E, B.A, B.com
